惒字的基本解释

惒
hé

惒
hè
古均同“和”。

惒字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hé］
［《廣韻》户戈切，平戈，匣。］
亦作“咊1”。亦作“惒1”。亦作“鉌1”。亦作“龢1”。
(1)和顺；平和。
(2)和谐，协调。
(3)适中；恰到好处。
(4)指身体健康舒适。
(5)和睦；融洽。
(6)谓使和睦；使融洽。
(7)喜悦。
(8)温和，气候温暖。
(9)调和；调治；调适。
(10)和解；息争而归和平。
(11)谓弈棋或赛球等的结局不分胜负。
(12)犹合。汇合；结合。
(13)交易。
(14)连带。
(15)介词。犹连。表示强调某一词或词组。
(16)介词。犹给，替。
(17)介词。犹向。
(18)介词。犹同。表示比较。
(19)连词。表示并列关系。犹与。
(20)象声词。参见“和和”。
(21)车铃。
(22)古代军队营垒之门。
(23)古乐器。古军乐器錞于。
(24)古乐器。小笙。
(25)棺题，棺材两头的突出部分。
(26)古代音乐术语。指单纯以吹奏乐器演奏。
(27)古代吴声、

惒字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惒； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页390第35
【正字通】俗和字。

惒字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
惒字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hé］
["Guangyun" Hu Geqi, Ping Ge, Xie. ]
Also known as "咊1". Also known as "Fan 1". Also known as "鉌1". Also known as "and 1".
(1) Heshun; peace.
(2) Harmony and coordination.
(3) Moderate; just right.
(4) Refers to physical health and comfort.
(5) Harmony; harmony.
(6) It means to make harmony; make harmony.
(7) Joy.
(8) Mild and warm climate.
(9) Reconciliation; adjustment; adjustment.
(10) Reconciliation; end the conflict and return to peace.
(11) It is said that the outcome of a game of chess or a ball is irrelevant.
(12) Juhe. Converge; combine.
(13) Transactions.
(14) Associated.
(15) Prepositions. Still. Indicates that a word or phrase is emphasized.
(16) Prepositions. Still give, for.
(17) Prepositions. Still to.
(18) Prepositions. The same. Represents comparison.
(19) Conjunctions. Indicates a parallel relationship. Still and.
(20) Onomatopoeia. See "Harmony".
(21) Car bell.
(22) The gate of the ancient army barracks.
(23) Ancient musical instruments. Ancient military musical instrument Yun Yu.
(24) Ancient musical instruments. Xiaosheng.
(25) Coffin title, the protruding parts at both ends of the coffin.
(26) Ancient musical terms. Refers to purely playing with wind instruments.
(27) Ancient Wu Sheng,
